((* if not is_first_entry *))
\vspace{8pt}
((* endif *))

\textbf{<<entry.name>>}((* if entry.location *)) -- <<entry.location>>((* endif *)) \hfill <<entry.date_string>>

((* for item in entry.highlights *))
    ((* if loop.first *))
\begin{highlights}
    ((* endif *))
\item <<item>>
    ((* if loop.last *))
\end{highlights}
    ((* endif *))
((* endfor *))
